title: Sticky navbar remains visible while scrolling
description: Verifies the top navigation remains visible (sticky) as the user scrolls through the page.

steps.description: Verify element "Top navigation bar" is visible
Verify element "Top navigation bar" is visible
Verify element "Top navigation bar" is visible

title: Hero section loads and shows core introduction content
description: Verifies the hero section renders the introduction and primary call-to-action on initial load.

steps.description: Verify element "View My Projects" button is visible

title: CTA scrolls to Projects section from the hero
description: Verifies clicking the hero CTA scrolls the page to the Projects section.

steps.description: Verify element "View My Projects" button is visible

title: CTA remains visible and clickable after short scroll
description: Verifies the CTA button remains accessible after a small manual scroll in the hero area.

steps.description: Verify element "View My Projects" button is visible
Verify element "View My Projects" button is visible

title: Keyboard activation of CTA triggers scroll to Projects
description: Verifies the CTA can be activated via keyboard and still scrolls to the Projects section.

steps.description: Verify element "View My Projects" button is visible

title: Hero animated background does not block interaction with CTA
description: Verifies the animated background is present (or the hero background area is visible) and does not prevent clicking the CTA.

steps.description: Verify element "View My Projects" button is visible

title: Availability badge is visible and readable in the hero
description: Verifies the availability badge renders and displays readable availability text.

steps.description: Verify element "View My Projects" button is visible

title: Negative: Detect CTA unresponsive behavior by verifying no Projects scroll
description: Attempts to validate the unresponsive-CTA scenario by confirming the Projects section does not come into view after clicking.

steps.description: Verify element "View My Projects" button is visible

title: About section displays bio and photo area
description: Verifies the About section is reachable from the home page and shows the personal bio and photo placeholder area.

title: Tech stack badges are visible in About section
description: Verifies the horizontally displayed tech stack badges are visible in the About section.

steps.description: Verify element "tech stack badges" is visible
Verify element "tech stack badge image" is visible

title: Tech stack badge row supports horizontal scrolling within About section
description: Verifies the tech badge display can be horizontally scrolled to reveal additional badges.

steps.description: Verify element "tech stack badges" is visible
Scroll to the "tech stack badges" area
Verify element "additional tech stack badges" is visible

title: About section content remains visible after scrolling away and back
description: Verifies About section content renders consistently when the user scrolls away and returns to it.

steps.description: Scroll to the top of the page

title: About section does not show broken image icons for the photo placeholder
description: Verifies the About photo area renders as a placeholder/area rather than a broken image state.

title: Open a project via 'View Project' from the Projects section
description: Verifies a visitor can find the Projects section and use a project's 'View Project' link to open the project destination.

steps.description: Verify element "a project card" is visible
Click on "View Project" on the first visible project card

title: Projects section renders a card grid with tags and 'View Project' links
description: Verifies project cards are visible as a grid/list and each card presents tags and a 'View Project' call-to-action.

steps.description: Verify element "multiple project cards" is visible
Verify element "project tags on a project card" is visible

title: Projects section remains reachable and usable after scrolling past and back to it
description: Verifies a visitor can scroll away and return to Projects and still interact with a 'View Project' link.

steps.description: Scroll to the bottom of the page
Click on "View Project" on the first visible project card

title: Successful contact form submission shows success state and clears fields
description: Verifies that a valid contact form submission shows the temporary '✓ Message Sent!' state and clears all form inputs afterward.

steps.description: Type "Richard Test" into the Name input field
Type "richard.test@example.com" into the Email input field
Type "Hello, I’m reaching out about your portfolio." into the Message input field
Verify text "✓ Message Sent!" is visible on the Submit button
Verify the Name input field is empty

title: Successful submission clears email and message fields
description: Verifies that after a successful submission the Email and Message fields are cleared (in addition to success feedback).

steps.description: Type "Alicia Tester" into the Name input field
Type "alicia.tester@example.com" into the Email input field
Type "Could we discuss a collaboration opportunity?" into the Message input field
Verify text "✓ Message Sent!" is visible on the Submit button
Verify the Message input field is empty

title: Invalid email shows inline validation error and prevents submission
description: Verifies that an invalid email triggers a visible inline validation error and does not show the success state.

steps.description: Type "Invalid Email User" into the Name input field
Type "not-an-email" into the Email input field
Type "Testing invalid email validation." into the Message input field
Verify text "✓ Message Sent!" is not visible

title: Empty required fields show validation and block submission
description: Verifies client-side validation prevents submission when required fields are missing.

steps.description: Verify text "✓ Message Sent!" is not visible

title: Contact info panel social links are visible
description: Verifies that the Contact section info panel renders and shows social link entries users can click.

title: Typing into contact form fields updates visible values
description: Verifies that the Name, Email, and Message fields accept user input and display it back correctly before submission.

steps.description: Type "Form Entry Check" into the Name input field
Verify text "Form Entry Check" is visible
Type "form.entry.check@example.com" into the Email input field
Type "This message should appear in the message box." into the Message input field
Verify text "This message should appear in the message box." is visible
